# dropDuplicates()

**Instance Method**

Creates a subset of the column by removing all duplicate elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func dropDuplicates() -> MLDataColumn<Element>
```

## Return Value

A new column.

## Discussion



## Discarding elements to generate a column

- **dropMissing()**: Creates a subset of the column by removing all elements without a value.
